title: Backend Foundation: Server, Models, and JSON Storage
description: Initialize Go backend structure, define core data models, and implement JSON file persistence with atomic writes and startup loading.
acceptance_criteria: Backend starts on configurable port with default 8080.
Storage path is configurable and defaults to ./data/budgetapp.json.
Startup creates missing data directory/file and loads existing data.
Malformed JSON file causes startup failure with clear error output.
